Header: Sri Lanka Army Women's Corps Marks its 22nd Anniversary
Content: A Get-Together organized by the Sri Lanka Army Women's Corps (SLAWC) Regimental Centre on account of its 22nd anniversary got underway at the Laya Leisure Kukuleganga on 27 December 2019. Major General D.A.P.N Dematanpitiya, Colonel Commandant, SLAWC attended as the Chief Guest. The event was coloured with entertaining features and lottery draws. Towards the end of the day's arrangement, Colonel Commandant SLAWC gave away special certificates to sportswomen who excelled in international championships. All officers and Other Ranks of the SLAWC Regimental Centre attended the event.
